revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Lake Acuity |image = [[File:Lake Acuity.png|300px]] |caption = A bird's-eye view of Lake Acuity. |tokens = 78,000 |location = North of Route 217, west of Snowpoint City. }} '''Lake Acuity''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 861,800 |- | Gyarados (Boss) || 4,070,000 |- | Uxie (Boss) || 8,070,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Sneasel * Bibarel * Psyduck * Golduck * Magikarp * Goldeen * Snover * Snorunt * Gyarados (boss) * Uxie (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 33% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 33% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} [[Lucky Egg]] || 33% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
